text: "Barefoot and Crazy" is a song recorded by American country music artist Jack Ingram. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Stephen Shepherd and premiered in July 10, 2009. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of July 10, 2009. ==References== Category:2009 songs Category:Jack Ingram songs
title: Barefoot and Crazy
